content: **knitted strawberry hat for baby and children in drops alpaca** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no z-086-byb yarn group a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 years fits head circumference in cm 40/42-42/44-44/46 48/50-50/52 / 16 -17 -18 19 -20 **materials** drops alpaca from garnstudio color no 7238m dark olive 50 g for all sizes color no 3620 red 50 g for all sizes drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm / us 1 or 2 - or size needed to get correct gauge also see sweet blueberry 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/sweet-blueberry
